summary: priscilla presley will serve as a witness at the first wedding to be held at an all-new chapel of love in las vegas . the 69-year-old collaborated with nbc 's today show to launch a contest for one elvis-obsessed couple to win the ` ultimate wedding ' the winning duo will tie the knot at elvis presley 's graceland wedding chapel inside the westgate hotel on thursday , april 23 . elvis performed more than 830 sold-out shows .

aspect: 1. Priscilla Presley serves as a witness at the first wedding at an all-new chapel of love in Las Vegas.
2. The winning couple will tie the knot at Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel inside the Westgate Hotel on April 23rd.

3. The contest aims to find an Elvis-obsessed couple for the 'ultimate wedding,' with a free wedding reception and hotel suite, as well as concert tickets and airfares to the Elvis Experience theater show.
explain: Priscilla Presley participates in the first wedding at a new chapel in Las Vegas, adding a unique element to this special event.

The winning couple in the contest organized by Priscilla Presley and the Today Show will have their dream wedding at the iconic Graceland Wedding Chapel, which was the location of Elvis Presley's memorable weddings. The event will take place on April 23rd at the Westgate Hotel in Las Vegas.

The contest by Priscilla Presley and the Today Show is looking for an Elvis-obsessed couple to win the "ultimate wedding," which includes a free wedding reception, hotel suite, concert tickets, and airfares to the Elvis Experience theater show.
